Mountain_View.Moffett Federal Airfield:
Moffett Federal Airfield (IATA: NUQ, ICAO: KNUQ, FAA LID: NUQ), also known as Moffett Field, is a joint civil-military airport located in an unincorporated part of Santa Clara County between northern Mountain View and northern Sunnyvale, California. On November 10, 2014, NASA announced that it would be leasing 1000 acres of the airfield property to Google for 60 years.
The airport is near the south end of San Francisco Bay, northwest of San Jose.
